languages.text: {n}Ульфар кивает слугам, и те низкими голосами заводят гортанную молитву. Тени пляшут по стенам, сплетаясь в величественном и дикарском танце. В мерцании свечей совершается священнодействие — облачение Ангела Императора в панцирь незыблемой веры и гнева Его.{/n}

{n}Ulfar nods to the servants, and in low voices they begin a guttural prayer. Shadows leap across the walls, twisting together in a majestic and savage dance. In the flickering candlelight, the sacred rite is performed — the Angel of the Emperor is clothed in the armour of unwavering faith and His wrath.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар кивает слугам, и те низкими голосами заводят гортанную молитву. Тени пляшут по стенам, сплетаясь в величественном и дикарском танце. В мерцании свечей совершается священнодействие — облачение Ангела Императора в панцирь незыблемой веры и гнева Его.{/n}

languages.text: {n}乌尔法向仆人们点了点头，他们开始低声祈祷。阴影跃过墙壁，在原始而野性的舞蹈中交织在一起。在摇曳的烛光中，神圣的仪式开始了。帝皇的天使披上了由坚定的信仰与祂炽烈的怒火编织成的盔甲。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar nods to the servants, and in low voices they begin a guttural prayer. Shadows leap across the walls, twisting together in a majestic and savage dance. In the flickering candlelight, the sacred rite is performed — the Angel of the Emperor is clothed in the armour of unwavering faith and His wrath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法向仆人们点了点头，他们开始低声祈祷。阴影跃过墙壁，在原始而野性的舞蹈中交织在一起。在摇曳的烛光中，神圣的仪式开始了。帝皇的天使披上了由坚定的信仰与祂炽烈的怒火编织成的盔甲。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}従者たちに向かってウルファーがうなずくと、彼らは声を落としてしゃがれ声で祈り始める。影たちは壁を跳び越え、身体をよじって共に壮麗かつ荒々しく舞い踊る。点滅するろうそくの明かりの中、神聖な儀式が執り行われ――皇帝の天使は、揺るがぬ信仰と父の憤怒というアーマーを装着する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar nods to the servants, and in low voices they begin a guttural prayer. Shadows leap across the walls, twisting together in a majestic and savage dance. In the flickering candlelight, the sacred rite is performed — the Angel of the Emperor is clothed in the armour of unwavering faith and His wrath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}従者たちに向かってウルファーがうなずくと、彼らは声を落としてしゃがれ声で祈り始める。影たちは壁を跳び越え、身体をよじって共に壮麗かつ荒々しく舞い踊る。点滅するろうそくの明かりの中、神聖な儀式が執り行われ――皇帝の天使は、揺るがぬ信仰と父の憤怒というアーマーを装着する。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}Ulfar asiente a los sirvientes, que con voz grave entonan una plegaria gutural. Las sombras reptan por las paredes, retorciéndose y entrelazándose en un baile tan majestuoso como salvaje. A la tenue luz de las velas se celebra el rito sagrado: el ángel del Emperador viste la armadura de la fe inquebrantable y de la ira de su creador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar nods to the servants, and in low voices they begin a guttural prayer. Shadows leap across the walls, twisting together in a majestic and savage dance. In the flickering candlelight, the sacred rite is performed — the Angel of the Emperor is clothed in the armour of unwavering faith and His wrath.{/n}

A la tenue luz de las velas se celebra el rito sagrado: el ángel del Emperador viste la armadura de la fe inquebrantable y de la ira de su creador.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}Ulfar fait un signe de tête aux serviteurs qui commencent une prière gutturale à voix basse. Des ombres courent sur les murs avant de se confondre dans une danse sauvage et majestueuse. À la lumière vacillante des bougies, le rite sacré est accompli pour revêtir l'ange de l'Empereur de l'armure de la foi inébranlable et du courroux impérial.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar nods to the servants, and in low voices they begin a guttural prayer. Shadows leap across the walls, twisting together in a majestic and savage dance. In the flickering candlelight, the sacred rite is performed — the Angel of the Emperor is clothed in the armour of unwavering faith and His wrath.{/n}

Des ombres courent sur les murs avant de se confondre dans une danse sauvage et majestueuse. À la lumière vacillante des bougies, le rite sacré est accompli pour revêtir l'ange de l'Empereur de l'armure de la foi inébranlable et du courroux impérial.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}Ulfar nickt den Dienern zu, und sie beginnen mit tiefen Stimmen ein kehliges Gebet an. Schatten springen über die Wände und vereinen sich zu einem majestätischen und wilden Tanz. Im flackernden Kerzenlicht wird das heilige Ritual durchgeführt – der Engel des Imperators wird in die Rüstung seines unerschütterlichen Glaubens und Seines Zorns gehüllt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar nods to the servants, and in low voices they begin a guttural prayer. Shadows leap across the walls, twisting together in a majestic and savage dance. In the flickering candlelight, the sacred rite is performed — the Angel of the Emperor is clothed in the armour of unwavering faith and His wrath.{/n}

Schatten springen über die Wände und vereinen sich zu einem majestätischen und wilden Tanz. Im flackernden Kerzenlicht wird das heilige Ritual durchgeführt – der Engel des Imperators wird in die Rüstung seines unerschütterlichen Glaubens und Seines Zorns gehüllt.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}Ulfar'ın işaretiyle hizmetkârlar, gırtlaktan kısık sesli bir dua okumaya başlıyorlar. Duvarlarda zıplayan gölgeler, görkemli ve vahşi bir dans ile birbirlerine karışıyor. Titreşen mum ışığında kutsal ayin gerçekleşiyor. İmparator'un Meleği, sarsılmaz inancı ve öfkesinden oluşan zırhını kuşanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar nods to the servants, and in low voices they begin a guttural prayer. Shadows leap across the walls, twisting together in a majestic and savage dance. In the flickering candlelight, the sacred rite is performed — the Angel of the Emperor is clothed in the armour of unwavering faith and His wrath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, hizmetkârlara işaret ediyor, gırlaktan kısık sesli bir dua okumaya başlıyorlar. Gölgeler duvarlarda zıplıyor, görkemli ve vahşi bir dans ile birbirlerine karışıyorlar. Titreşen mum ışığında kutsal ayin gerçekleşiyor. İmparator'un Meleği, sarsılmaz inancı ve öfkesinden oluşan zırhını kuşanıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked
